traits.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Jarund hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Warhammer
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, and Jarund pushes the target 5 feet away from him if it's Large or smaller. Jarund then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Jarund, that creature can make an attack against the target as a reaction.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
